reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 341/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF MONO
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — TOWNSHIP OF MONO
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 341/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF MONO
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Mono with respect to all applications made after July 1, 1998 for land situate in the municipality. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 39/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Mono with respect to all applications made after July 1, 1998 for land situate in the municipality. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 39/01, s. 2.

content.content:
2. Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act
to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Mono with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 2; O. Reg. 39/01, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 2. Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Mono with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 2; O. Reg. 39/01, s. 3.

content.content: 3. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is in turn delegated to a committee of the municipality or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the municipality shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 3 (1); O. Reg. 39/01, s. 4. (2) A delegation of authority in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is in turn delegated to a committee of the municipality or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the municipality shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 3 (1); O. Reg. 39/01, s. 4.

(2) A delegation of authority in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 341/98, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 341/98, s. 4. Schedule 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 39/01, s. 5 Schedule 2 The Township of Mono 22–T–87003 22–T–88007 22–T–89002 22–T–91005 22–T–91009 O. Reg. 341/98, Sched. 2; O. Reg. 39/01, s. 6.
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 341/98, s. 4.
